nodes.text: Rake-riding was a dangerous sport held in the Korsinata, a stadium in Tahv, the capital city of Kesh. Humans wrangled with uvak whose wings had been clipped and fitted with glass prongs for the entertainment of the Lost Tribe of Sith. An unsuccessful assassination attempt on Grand Lord Lillia Venn was made during a rake-riding event by the uvak wrangler Campion Dey in 3960 BBY.
